snippet: RINALDI--Joseph Martin, 67, suddenly on May 6, 2016. Beloved father of Timothy Rinaldi, loving brother of Elsie Rebovich, loving former husband of Nancy Flood Rinaldi, predeceased by his loving companion Libby McClintock. Also survived by his beloved Roshi. Services handled by Scott D. Conklin Funeral Home, Millerton, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RINALDI, JOSEPH MARTIN
